definition: of or relating to the palm of the hand or to the area at the base of the thumb, the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the palm of the hand or to the area at the base of the thumb
= synonyms: thenal
noun
- the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers
= synonyms: palm
- the fleshy area of the palm at the base of the thumb
